column1:
View the University of Michigan WebScope at http://virtualslides.med.umich.edu/Histology/Basic%20Tissues/
Nervous%20Tissue/065-2_HISTO_40X.svs/view.apml (http://openstaxcollege.org/l/spinalroot) to explore the
tissue sample in greater detail. If you zoom in on the dorsal root ganglion, you can see smaller satellite glial
cells surrounding the large cell bodies of the sensory neurons. From what structure do satellite cells derive during
embryologic development?
